Name: SunLightArea
Notes: An area that defeats Boos and removes the Boo power-up from the player if they are not covered by "Sunshade" collision meshes. SunshadeMapParts is the only class of objects that supports these collision meshes. Thus, the area cannot be properly utilized in SMG2.

SW_APPEAR.Description: The object will appear when this switch is activated.

SW_AWAKE.Description: The object will become visible and resume movement when this switch is activated.

BaseMtxFollower.Description: Objects of this class can follow another BaseMtxFollowTarget object.
